data.text: O! Yehowa, nu ka ta nèle adzɔge ʋĩi ɖo?
Ame vɔ̃ɖi dadala he hiãtɔ ƒu anyi,
Nu siwo eƒe dzi dina la, egblɔnɛ adegbeƒotɔe;
Ame vɔ̃ɖi la media eƒe mɔ o,
Eƒe mɔwo dzea edzi nɛ nyuie ɣe sia ɣi,
Egblɔna na eɖokui be, “Naneke maʋuʋum o,
Fiƒode, alakpa kple ŋɔdzidodo yɔ eƒe nu me fũu,
Edea xa ɖe ɣaɣlɛƒe abe dzatae be ɖe ave xa ene;
Etoa ƒu ɖe lãme na ame siwo wòlé,
Tso, Yehowa! O! Mawu, kɔ wò abɔ dzi.
Nu ka ta ame vɔ̃ɖi la le alɔme ɖem le Mawu ŋuti ɖo?
Ke wò, O! Mawu, koe kpɔa dzɔgbevɔ̃e kple vevesese;
Ŋe abɔ na ame vɔ̃ɖi kple nu tovo wɔla;
Yehowae nye fia tso mavɔ me yi mavɔ me;
O! Yehowa, èse hiãtɔwo ƒe didi;
Èʋli tsyɔ̃eviwo kple ame siwo wote ɖe anyi la ta,
